ExtendedSection.Title: Server-side preparation for a UGC session 3

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: In the formatter, only two lines are special: The use of the <cms:ugc> to initialize the session and the parameter at the <form> tag. Note that this serves equally well for editing existing content (when providing the UUID of the content to edit via the fileId parameter) or creating a new content (when not providing a fileId parameter).
